Race.SpecificTitle: PW PC (Sales & Use Tax) -- 0.50% S&U - PC - 30 yrs
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Tangipahoa, State of Louisiana (the "Parish") be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one-half cent (0.50%) (an estimated $8,670,000 reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year) (the "Tax"), upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Parish for a period of thirty (30) years, beginning January 1, 2014, with the net proceeds of the Tax to be dedicated and used for the purpose of renovation and enlargement of the existing Parish jail (or replacement with a new facility if more cost effective to do so) and for all costs associated with the maintenance, operation, staffing thereof, and the housing of Parish and municipal prisoners in accordance with a cooperative endeavor agreement between the Tangipahoa Parish Sheriff's Office and the Parish, subject to funding into bonds, with any surplus allocated as follows: 50% to the Sheriff for purposes directly related to law enforcement; and 50% to the Parish for expenses related to the Parish courthouse and the criminal justice system?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PC (Library Tax Renewal) -- 2.81 Mills - PC - 10 yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Tangipahoa, State of Louisiana, (the "Parish"), be authorized to renew the levy of a 2.81 mill tax on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $1,423,296.23 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) (the "Tax"), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2024, for the purpose of the maintenance and support of the Tangipahoa Parish Library and its branches?
